name: They Came From Space
description:
Think you know Space Invaders? Think again!

'They Came From Space' take the retro classic and puts a whole new spin on it

Defend your base from the invaders and they get closer and closer

swipe left and right to rotate the game world and battle space invaders in 4D

* Simple Controls
* Classic rules apply
* Play 4 sides at the same time
* Compete for the best score

Retro has just evolved!
